name: Oppo Reno15 Pro
highlights:
Expected announcement 2025, November 17

Android 16, ColorOS 16
256GB/512GB/1TB storage, no card slot

BODY.Build: Glass front, aluminum alloy frame, glass back
BODY.SIM:
· Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM + eSIM (max 2 at a time)
· Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM
BODY: IP68/IP69 dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 2m for 30 min)

DISPLAY.Protection: Corning Gorilla Glass or Crystal Shield Glass

PLATFORM.CPU: Octa-core (1x3.63 GHz Cortex-X925 & 3x3.3 GHz Cortex-X4 & 4x2.4 GHz Cortex-A720)

MAIN CAMERA.Triple:
200 MP, f/1.9, 23mm (wide), 1/1.56", 0.5µm, PDAF, OIS
50 MP, f/2.8, 80mm (periscope telephoto), PDAF, OIS, 3.5x optical zoom
50 MP, f/2.0, 16mm, 116˚ (ultrawide), AF
MAIN CAMERA.Features: Color spectrum sensor, LED flash, HDR, panorama

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass

BATTERY.Charging:
80W wired, 13.5W PD, 33W UFCS, 33W PPS
50W wireless
Reverse wired
